description: please add an option of removing this app
If you don't understand Japanese this app just gets in the way, it is no use. what it needs is a simple way to un-install it.
summary: lousy app if you don't use Japanese

description: needs a way t be removes
Should only be installed based on install language!

All these people are complaining about it's inability to be uninstalled, rather than focusing on what job it performs and how well. It does what the name suggests and does it well. If you really have a complaint about not being to uninstall it, you should probably email your distro provider.
summary: Does what it says on the tin

description: Need the ability to uninstall characters a hacker may use if system is breached...

Might as well have another review that actually talks about the software itself.

It allows you to easily write Japanese and is fairly easy to pick up, even if you have never used it before. A ton of shortcuts help to quickly switch between input modes or convert words between different character sets. It feels overall very natural to use.

There are still some problems though (hence only 4 stars). The dropdown list for switching between different kanji could be bigger as it is sometimes difficult to discern small differences between items. Some of the default keyboard shortcuts are so cryptic that I still don't know what they are supposed to represent (how would you interpret the key combination "Hiragana Katakana"?). And losing focus of the text area, while having an unfinished character sequence, will render you unable to input more text until you abort the current sequence (you won't have any visual indicator that the sequence is still active though).
summary: Great at what it is supposed to do

description:
please
add option to remove it
Wothless non working piece of junk
unnecessary app with no option to remove

As of 03/05/21 - To remove this garbage:

sudo dnf remove ibus-kkc-1.5.22-14.fc33.x86_64

Reboot
yeah it does what it says it will and fairly well at that.

I definitely won't need or use it. Why am I not allowed to de-install it?
Such unnecessary things always stay in my way when I am searching for something that I really need to find.

Use

sudo dnf rm libkkc

to remove it.
